name: Agave
headline: Financial data infrastructure for Construction
description:
We‚Äôre modernizing construction, a $12T global industry run by siloed software built 20-40 years ago (on-prem, no APIs, no mobile access, etc.). 

Our core product is Agave Sync, which helps General and Trade Contractors keep financial data in sync between their field teams on jobsites and their accounting teams in a central back office.

founders.name: Tom Reno, Co-founder
founders.description: Tom is co-founder/CEO of Agave. Before Agave, Tom worked at Amazon, Barclays Investment Bank, and Graphiq (acq. by Amazon). He is a proud Delawarian.

founders.name: Pooria Azimi, Founder
founders.description: Pooria is the co-founder of Agave. Prior to Agave, Pooria was a core engineer behind Graphiq, a semantic search startup in Santa Barbara, CA, later acquired by Amazon to power Alexa. At Amazon, he helped scale Graphiq Search to dozens of languages and billions of queries per month. Originally from Iran, he has a master degree in Computer Science from Oregon State University.

founders.name: Samantha Zhang, Founder
founders.description: Samantha Zhang is the co-founder of Agave. Prior to Agave, Samantha had been in charge of Amazon Alexa‚Äôs knowledge experiences on all multimodal devices and had designed data visualizations for leading publishers such as AP, Reuters, MSN, and Yahoo.

founders.name: John Zucchi, Founder
founders.description: John is a co-founder of Agave. Before Agave, John was a Technical Program Manager at Amazon Alexa building an enterprise product from inception, Product Manager at Graphiq (acq. by Amazon), and Equity Capital Markets Analyst at Barclays Investment Bank. John graduated from Columbia, and was born and raised in Toronto üá®üá¶.

### Agave API for Software Vendors
We help Construction Software Companies to integrate with other source systems with ease. We provide a unified API to access data across all the construction software platforms like Procore, BIM 360, QuickBooks Online, and more. We also save you time by providing best-in-class documentation and pre-built front end components. 
##### [Agave Link + Agave API ![Agave Link](https://www.agaveapi.com/assets/img/link-overview.png) Authorization, request paths, data schemas for all source systems in a consistent way. Learn more ‚Üí ](https://www.agaveapi.com/</link/>)

This is crucial because, in an industry often siloed by standalone applications, Agave bridges the gap, ensuring that everyone‚Äîfrom the site manager to the accountant‚Äîhas access to the same current data.

Currently, Agave is on the lookout for talent across engineering, product, and sales roles as it scales‚Äîindicative of its growth phase. Their offerings include pricing plans for contractors and a library of useful use cases, demonstrating a customer-centric approach. 

In short, Agave is not just another SaaS company; it's a necessary player in propelling the construction industry into the future by enabling integrations with over 35 existing software systems. As they continue to grow, they‚Äôd be worth keeping an eye on for anyone invested in construction or technology.
